brews.name: Week Sauce
brews.description: This lager-esque beer is also low calorie, without sacrificing flavor.

brews.name: If Only I Had Seen This Coming
brews.description: An American Cream Ale with Mandarina Bavaria hops and Valencia Orange Peel contributing a distinct orange aroma and character.

brews.name: Legend of the Lost Golden
brews.description: Classic golden in body, but finished with hops traditionally used in a Hazy for that super fruity aroma and finishing flavor.

brews.name: Kate's Nutty Shutdown Brown
brews.description: An Owed to the Service Industry, this ale blends strong caramelized malts with other darker varietals for that perfect balance between sweet and bitter.

brews.name: Bet it all on Red
brews.description: Following the irish tradition of a dry finish, but with layer upon layer of caramel malts that unfold as you sip.

brews.name: Brew Looks Like a Hazy
brews.description: Light in body without being thin, this traditional Bavarian hefe is influenced primarly by clove flavors rather than banana.

brews.name: Reverend's Step-Daughter
brews.description: Following our tradition of sticking to the basics with our Belgian styles, this is a straight-down-the-middle interpretation of a Belgian blonde. Delivers notes of vanilla and corriander along with vibrant, fruity esters produced by this Belgian yeast.

brews.name: Ginger Soul
brews.description: Based on the famed Saison Dupont yeast strain with a high percentage of wheat malt for extra body to balance against the power of the Ginger.

brews.name: Tripel Trouble
brews.description: Traditionally spiced with sweet orange peel, coriander, and star anise that each make their appearance in gentle layers as you sip.

brews.name: Clocked Out
brews.description: Roasty and smokey, with a velvety texture to the last sip.

brews.name: Sneaky Fox
brews.description: High gravity and heavy hops make this a hard hitting IPA.

brews.name: Holiday Excess-B
brews.description: A pumped up version of our traditional ESB, fermented warm to produce additional fruity esters and fantastic character. This drinks a little like a Belgian Dark Strong, but not quite so heavy, and not quite so dark.

brews.name: Winey the Elder
brews.style: Red Wine Barrel aged Cranberry Imperial Stout
brews.description: This one has been in storage for 2 years, just waiting for the right time to share it with our favorite die hard fans. The cranberry tartness serves to blend the red wine notes into the hearty malts of our Imperial Stout recipe.

brews.name: Johann Sebastian Doppelbock
brews.description: Based on a the profile and specs of a prominent authentic German Doppelbock, this dark, malty german lager has all of the chocolate and caramel notes you could ask for.

brews.name: Dry-Hopped Pacific Amber
brews.description: A well-balanced red with NW hop flair.

brews.name: 100 Shilling in the Name Of
brews.description: Complex layers of carmelized malts paired with a small amount of peated malt for a perfectly balanced Scottish that you can actually have more than one of!

brews.name: Draft Master Mike
brews.description: Vanilla and caramel round out this smooth high gravity beer.

brews.name: Head Full of Hops and Dreams v2
brews.description: A strong back of tongue bitterness with heaps of late addition hops for citrus influenced flavor and aroma.

brews.name: Stout Scout Stout
brews.description: This rich and roasty tasting stout will give a slight flavor of cocoa. Best enjoyed with your friends on a cold afternoon while trying to solve all the worlds problems.

brews.name: Honeycrisp
brews.description: Straightforward Apple-centric cider with a perfect level of sweetness.

brews.name: 2019 Estate
brews.description: Dry, artfully crafted cider from the 2019 apple harvest, aged to perfection.
